pr_title: Add filter to the feed group dialog to show only ungrouped subscriptions

timeline.message: Add search for subscription picker in the feed group dialog

Fix subscription picker items flickering in the feed group dialog

The adapter could not tell the items were the same because the
subscription class was missing some methods (i.e. equals and hashcode),
so a full rebind was being done.

replies.bodyText:
Yes, keep in mind that Room won't let the app compile if any SQL statement is not correct. But it indeed is optional, either as a column or a table alias.
If I remember correctly, the convention (at least in SQLite) is to use the AS keyword when aliasing a column and omit it when aliasing a table.
Not so sure about that though.
